title: [Large-Scale] Robotics Project-Based Programming and Software Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming concepts and understanding of algorithms
context.additional_context: Individual Learner Use of Robot Simulation Tools and PBL-Based Team Project Execution

learning_goals: Students can create software design documents to solve real-world robot control problems.
Students can complete robotics project tasks by applying systematic procedures for analyzing unstructured problems.
Students can implement robot applications using open-source hardware platforms through collaborative work.
Students can evaluate self-efficacy during problem-solving processes and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
